comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110120 Firefox/4.0b10pre
Build Identifier: 

When the password doorhanger shows and user opens the button menu it dissapear after page redirection

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open testcase
2. Fill in username and password and send form
3. Open button menu in doorhanger
4. Wait few seconds
Actual Results:  
Page redirects and button menu closes

Expected Results:  
Button menu shouldn't close after page redirection
comments.author: jk1700@gazeta.pl
comments.creator: jk1700@gazeta.pl
